ML_AA_NAMES.AA_NAME: Ministry of transport and communications of the Republic of Lithuania

TI_DOC.P: LT-Vilnius: Public passenger transport services by rail and by road

STI_DOC.P: Ministry of transport and communications of the Republic of Lithuania
Information on the direct award of a public service contract

CONTENTS.P: Ministry of transport and communications of the Republic of Lithuania intends to award public service contract directly to a legally distinct entity and, according to the Article 7 of the Regulation (EC) No 1370/2007 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 23.10.2007 on public passenger transport services by rail and by road and repealing Council Regulations (EEC) Nos. 1191/69 and 1107/70 (OJ L 315, 3.12.2007, p. 1), requests to publish the following information in the Official journal of the European Union:

(a) The name and address of the competent authority: Ministry of transport and communications of the Republic of Lithuania, Gedimino Av. 17, LT-01505 Vilnius, LITHUANIA. Tel.: +370 5 239 3911, fax: +370 5 212 4335, e-mail: sumin@sumin.lt
(b) The type of award envisaged: direct award.

(c) The services and areas potentially covered by the award: public passenger transport services by railways all over Lithuanian territory. It is planned that public service contract will not exceed an annual provision of 6 300 000 train kilometres of public passenger transport services. Detailed routes and exact amount of train kilometres will be agreed during negotiations phase.
